actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mngwa makes one Ethereal Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Ethereal Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Ethereal Step
bonus_actions.desc: The mngwa magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa. When it leaves or enters the Material Plane, a puff of gray smoke briefly appears in the space on the Material Plane it leaves or enters.

special_abilities.name: Ethereal Coat
special_abilities.desc: The mngwa's AC includes its Charisma modifier (included above).

special_abilities.name: Ethereal Sight
special_abilities.desc: The mngwa can see 30 feet into the Ethereal Plane when on the Material Plane and vice versa.

special_abilities.name: Feline Passivism
special_abilities.desc: No felines or weretigers can willingly attack the mngwa. They can be forced to do so through magical means.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The mngwa has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The mngwa has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the mngwa's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Running Leap
special_abilities.desc: With a 10-foot running start, the mngwa can long jump up to 25 feet.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Felines
special_abilities.desc: The mngwa can communicate with felines as if they shared a language.
